message.body: are you back in atlanta yet?
We're about half an hour away actually
So almost!
haha, i'm psychic. have you heard from zach s####### recently?
Nah, porquoi?
i think he's lonely. he's texted me on and off for like the last 4 days. and wants me to visit... hopefully joking about that part, though.
I mean we both know how he goes through these weird cycles, you know?
exactly! i wouldn't mind otherwise but knowing i'm just part of the cycle makes me feel sorta used, haha.
No yeah I know exactly what you mean. I wonder if he'll ever get over it. The whole thing is pretty depressing for him and for those he uses
yeah. i'd love to see him find someone that he really cares about enough--like more than he cares about himself--that he'd grow out of it.
Hopefully that eventually happens but I doubt it will be soon. His system is pretty engrained at this point

yeah. :( makes me sad. he is fun to talk to, though, and since i'm not getting much social interaction myself, it's not so bad. btw i'm about to snap you one of these cute bobby pins that i got in my birchbox.
Yeah, kid's pretty funny if nothing else haha. Do ittt, I live for cute bobby pins :)
haha, it was harder than i thought to take a pic of my head.
Yeah that's a weird angle. What have you been up to this past week?
literally nothing productive. watched a ton of netflix and napped. lisa finally got back to me so i can start working again tomorrow.
Oh that's good! Wt have you been watching, anything worthwhile?

i watched that new netflix original series "orange is the new black" because it was written by the writer of weeds and really liked it. also watched the first season of hart of dixie, which stars rachel bilson and is cheesy but cute.
also this indie movie 'starlet', which was good. and world war z in theaters, which i liked.
I've heard orange is the new black is good, maybe I'll do that when I FINALLY finish Buffy
are you close to the end?
Halfway through season 6 of 7 total, so pretty close
are they hour long episodes?
Halfway through season 6 of 7 total, so pretty close
Yeah man, it takes some serious time commitment
you could put that shit on your resume
